thread.title: Lady Gaga Reveals a Sneak Peek at Her Super Bowl Beauty Prep
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Reveals a Sneak Peek at Her Super Bowl Beauty Prep

title: Lady Gaga Reveals a Sneak Peek at Her Super Bowl Beauty Prep
text: View on Instagram This weekend, Lady Gaga is set to sweep Texas by taking the 2017 Super Bowl halftime stage in typical showstopping fashion. Today, the pop star shared an early look at the coming spectacle, in the form of an off-the-cuff backstage beauty clip. Stripped down to her bra to prep for an early-morning press conference, Gaga shimmied and swiveled her hips to the beat of Don Henley’s “Dirty Laundry,” a pair of hydrating under-eye sheet masks on proud display. As she tossed her blonde lengths back and forth, the singer revealed several inches of dark roots, helpfully blown back not by a wind machine, but a gray and hot pink Dyson hair dryer. Houston won’t know what hit it. In This Story: Lady Gaga Recommended For You
